devdoc.author: Kelvin Yin
devdoc.details: Each car will have unique hash which is then map to         the address of the owner/borrower.

addCar(bytes32,bytes).details: Make sure the message sender is the owner of the car

params.carHash: Unique hash code for the car
params.signature: Signature that was signed by the owner of the car

addCar(bytes32,bytes).return: True if success, throw error otherwise

rentCar(bytes32,address,bytes).details: Make sure the message sender is the borrower who borrow the car

params.carHash: Unique hash code for the car
params.signature: Signature theat was signed by the borrower of the car

rentCar(bytes32,address,bytes).return: True if success, throw error otherwise

returnCar(bytes32,address).details: Make sure the message sender is the borrower who borrow the car

params.carHash: Unique hash code for the car

returnCar(bytes32,address).return: True if success, throw error otherwise

devdoc.title: The blockchain network for car owner validation

addCar(bytes32,bytes).notice: Add new block on when car is added

rentCar(bytes32,address,bytes).notice: Add new block when car is rented

returnCar(bytes32,address).notice: Add new block when car is returned

userdoc.notice: Use this contract for car ownership validation
